message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper presents a hierarchical convolutional document model that uses visualisation techniques from computer vision to identify and extract topic-relevant sentences. This suggests that the paper could belong to the sub-categories of natural language processing (cs.CL), computer vision (cs.CV), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Among these, cs.CL and cs.CV are the most likely sub-categories as they are directly mentioned in the abstract.
